EmailTemplate.description: Sends an email to the applicant to complete a report on their program sponsorship.
EmailTemplate.name: BIC-Grant - Program Follow-Up Report Request (2)
EmailTemplate.subject: Business Incubation Grant Application-Program Reporting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear{!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.First_Name__c},
Thanks again for involving the City of Toronto in your business incubation program - we appreciate the opportunity to be involved.
As part of our grant to support your program we require a small report on the activities delivered as part of the program. Could you please complete the following report form?
https://cityoftoronto.tfaforms.net/355825?Email={!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.Email__c}&accid={!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.Account_IDId__c}&conid={!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.Contact_IDId__c
Thanks and please keep us involved in your upcoming activities.
Regards,
Nina
Nina Gesa Economic Development Officer City of Toronto www.toronto.ca/business
